description:
Gemini (Andi Rye) has always envied her parents, who grew up in the 60s hippie era. So she’s thrilled when she meets fellow hippie Sage (Tommy Pistol) at a park. He convinces her that he’s found an environment of love and peace and she goes with him to check it out. Tommy introduces her to his cult family (Della Dane and Lily Lane). The girls approve of the new recruit, so Sage gives Gemini a kiss. Soon, clothes are coming off and the group gets a hot love-in going, including taking turns sucking Sage’s cock. And they’re just getting started! (part 1 of 4)

This is a scene from Mind Fucked: A Cult Classic, XBIZ Award 2019 winner, Fetish Release of the Year, AVN Award 2019 nominee Best Drama.
title: My Life in a Sex Cult: Chapter One
